Liebe - Home Assistant Dashboard

A modern, customizable dashboard for Home Assistant with a beautiful UI.

Installation

Add the following to your Home Assistant configuration.yaml:

panel_custom:
  - name: liebe-panel
    sidebar_title: Liebe
    sidebar_icon: mdi:heart
    url_path: liebe
    module_url: https://fx.github.io/liebe/dist/panel.js

Then restart Home Assistant and find "Liebe" in the sidebar.
